trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref> for a specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref>特定<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 設定文字強調<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>透過<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>的執行個體上的屬性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>所傳回的物件</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>上屬性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 每個綜合語音引擎就可以決定如何呈現強調;強調的本質不同語言、 方言、 性別或語音。

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisWord and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個 EmphasisWord 和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>時設定或取得可能需要使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisWord are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: EmphasisWord 的實際值是大於或等於零的事實以及變更值的區別在於兩個值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>所有小於零，且使用的值是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>所傳回物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>執行個體上的屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: 表示強調特定引擎的預設層級。
指出任何指定的加強語氣。
